Audio Description: In this poster about national security, the anguished face of a soldier looks out, his hand pointing at the viewer as it rises out of the green and blue waves in a pitch-black background. Large pale blue block letters above and below the image of the soldier proclaim “Someone talked!”
Creator: United States. Emergency Management Office. War Information Office
Description: Poster, 101 x 70 cm, artist: Frederick Siebel
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.
Subject [LCSH]: National security--United States; World War, 1939-1945--United States; War posters, American
Title: Someone talked!
